item.description:
# Python's `for` and `while` loops # support an `else` clause that executes # only if the loops terminates without # hitting a `break` statement.
def contains(haystack, needle): """ Throw a ValueError if `needle` not in `haystack`. """ for item in haystack: if item == needle: break else: # The `else` here is a # "completion clause" that runs # only if the loop ran to completion # without hitting a `break` statement. ...

item.title: {Swing state ad spend and cough-bots}
item.description: Your round-up of the latest, greatest data storiesHelloAs the US election dominates the news, with even the concept of democracy causing a scuffle (the cry of âcount every voteâ responding to Trumpâs call to stop counting votes!) data has been published that reveals the spend per state for political ads. An AI has been used to analyse 25,000 TV ads. It finds that Florida takes the largest slice of the pie with a spend totalling $145m; other key swing states also attract big $$. Weâ...
